detectors.description:
IcoOKOToken.fallback() (contractSource/scsc/ClassyCoin.sol#272-288) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now <= endTime && now >= startTime) (contractSource/scsc/ClassyCoin.sol#273)
	- require(bool)(totalTokensSold < maxTokensToSold) (contractSource/scsc/ClassyCoin.sol#275)
	- require(bool)(tokensToSend >= 1000000 && tokensToSend <= 350000000000) (contractSource/scsc/ClassyCoin.sol#278)
	- valueToReturn > 0 (contractSource/scsc/ClassyCoin.sol#283)
